Question: Hyper Bicycles, Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hyper Bicycles, Inc

Product: CES 2024 Innovations

- HyperJuice HJ7003, HJ5009, HJ3006, HJ3004, HJ5008
- HyperDrive HD5051, HD5003, HD2030, HJ1002, HJ1003
- Chargers and power banks with Qi2 wireless standard
- Travel chargers with GaN technology
- High-speed connectivity solutions
- Hyper specializes in tech, mobile accessories
- Groundbreaking products for creative professionals
- Headquartered in Silicon Valley, California
- Cutting-edge tech solutions for power, connectivity, mobility, and desktop
- Enabling creators and innovators to Go Beyond
- Unveiling 37 new products at CES 2024
- Qi2 Chargers, Power Banks, Multi-Port Wall Chargers, Connectivity solutions
- Visit HYPER at CES 2024 to experience new products

- HyperJuice HJ7003、HJ5009、HJ3006、HJ3004、HJ5008

- 让创作者和创新者超越极限
